name: Pandan Waffles
instructions: Beat the egg until fluffy. Add coconut milk and pandan extract. Stir well.
In a separate bowl, mix together all the dry ingredients: all-purpose flour, corn starch, sugar, baking powder, coconut flakes, and salt.
Combine the dry ingredients with the wet ingredients. Let the batter rest for 15 minutes.
Preheat the waffle iron and grease with butter.
Add one ladleful of the batter into the waffle iron. Press and hold for a few seconds. Then cook until golden brown.
Top with berries as desired. Then enjoy!
